availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Marshall County, Kentucky, saddler. Tennessee native. Married to Elizabeth J. Turner in 1836. Married to Laura C. Tinnin Cooper in 1849. Father of R. T. Cooper, S. C. Cooper, M. J. Cooper, Erwin C. Cooper, John B. Cooper, A. R. Cooper, Harriet L. Cooper, Martha C. Cooper, Henry Cooper, Jinnis Cooper, and Sarah Cooper.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, unknown district, p. 119. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Missouri, Stoddard County, Castor Township, p. 8. Tennessee State Marriages, 1780-2002 [database on-line]. Provo, UT, USA: Ancestry.com Operations Inc, 2008.
